item.title: The Bookbot Situation
item.description:
This is going to be a relatively short post as I am writing this to shed light on the situation of a bot I built a few years ago called BookBot.

Current Situation

As part of Discord’s safety policy, verified bots have to be periodically re-verified. The last time the bot was verified was 3 years ago. It used to be added to around ~2850 servers and actively running before Discord enforced re-verification.
